name: stacks
title: Stacks
description: Transform your digital footprint into personal intelligence
author: sourabh_rathour

commands.name: search-resources
commands.title: Stacks Search
commands.subtitle: Grid view of your resources
commands.description: Search your saved resources in a grid view

commands.name: search-resources-list
commands.title: Stacks Search List
commands.subtitle: Detailed list view of your resources
commands.description: Search your saved resources in a detailed list view with previews

preferences.name: gqlToken
preferences.title: API Token (Optional)
preferences.description: Your Stacks API token from the gqlToken cookie. You can also set this up in the extension.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
